verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:10
verses.text: Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:11
verses.text: For it hath been declared unto me of you, my brethren, by them which are of the house of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:12
verses.text: Now this I say, that every one of you saith, I am of Paul; and I of Apollos; and I of Cephas; and I of Christ.
